thoughts.text: I can use the google command to search for a website that provides information about love.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the google command will allow me to search for a website that provides information about love. This will help me achieve my goal of learning about love.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the google command to search for a website that provides information about love
- Use the browse_website command to explore the website
- Analyze the information on the website to learn more about love
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to rely solely on one source of information and make sure to consider multiple perspectives and sources when learning about a topic.
thoughts.speak: I will now use the google command to search for a website that provides information about love. What should I search for?
